{
    "id_event": 38,
    "title": "Soirée crêpes",
    "description": null,
    "date_start": null,
    "date_end": null,
    "date_created": "2019-05-26 15:50:13",

    "participants": [
        {
            "id": 21,
            "firstmane": "liuiyiuyl",
            "lastname": "lien",
            "pseudo": "nicolnt",
            "photo_url": "nom_photo.jpg",
            "status": 1,
            "participation": "2"
        }
    ],
    "place": {
        "id_place": 34,
        "postcode": 444333,
        "street": "Rue de L'IMAC",
        "number": 12,
        "city": "Marne-la-Vallée",
        "name": "La coloc infernale !"
    },
    "type": {
        "id_type": 11,
        "name": "cours"
    },
    "posts": [
        {
            "id": 7,
            "title": "J'adore la nourriture",
            "content": "Comme vous le savez, manger c'est la vie, c'est ce qu'il y a de plus beau. Donc servez moi comme il faut",
            "date_created": "2019-05-26",
            "date_edited": "2019-05-26",
            "id_user": 21,
            "id_event": 38,
            "comments": [
                {
                    "id": 5,

                    "date_created": "2019-05-26",
                    "date_edited": "2019-05-26",
                    "id_user": 21,
                    "id_post": 7
                }
            ]
        }
    ]
}

response.body:
BEGIN:VCALENDAR
METHOD:REQUEST
VERSION:2.0
PRODID:-//Lolimac Events//Lolimac//FR
BEGIN:VEVENT
SUMMARY:Révision maths
UID:e369853df766fa44e1ed0ff613f563bd
STATUS:CONFIRMED
DTSTART:20190531T100000Z
DTEND:20190531T153000Z
DTSTAMP:20190526T171017Z
LOCATION:La coloc infernale Marne-la-Vallée 444333 n°12 Rue de L'IMAC
END:VEVENT
END:VCALENDAR
